alert.note: Alert for Adams; Blackford; Grant; Jay; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 12:08PM EST until February 04 at 1:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 12 inches by Thursday evening. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph Thursday * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL IMPACTS...Periods of rain will change to a mix of rain, sleet and snow this afternoon and eventually all snow by the afternoon commute. The delayed switch to snow will keep snow amounts to 2 to 4 inches by late evening. Light snow will linger through tonight then increase in intensity on Thursday. An additional 4 to locally as much as 7 inches is possible on Thursday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
